column1: appeal  to  the  Supreme  Court.    Section  5(1)  and  (2)  of  that  Act

column2: 5(1)  Any  person  who  is  dissatisfied  with  any  judgement

person  is  a  party  may  prefer  an  appeal  to  the  Supreme
